abstract: The amount of eastern Atlantic bluefin tuna traded on the global market in 2010 exceeded the official quota by 141 percent, according to an analysis commissioned by the Pew Environment Group.
snippet: The amount of eastern Atlantic bluefin tuna traded on the global market in 2010 exceeded the official quota by 141 percent, according to an analysis commissioned by the Pew Environment Group.

headline.main: Industry Flouts Bluefin Catch Limits, Study Says
